title: Mouse keeps leaving league window in game
body: I only have 1 monitor so its not the dual monitor thing, I play in windowed mode and always have, and no problems till today.

replies.body:
Even in borderless your mouse should stay in-game, unless you are alt-tabbing often.  There may be a messed up config that's causing issue, so a reset might help.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Otherwise, full screen should help with that as well!
